feed.id: IF YOU CAN SEE THIS TEXT, ATOM FEEDS ARE NOT SUPPORTED

entry.title: IF YOU CAN SEE THIS TEXT, BUT NO PRECEEDING TEXT, ATOM FEEDS ARE PROBABLY SUPPORTED
entry.content: <font color=red>IF THIS TEXT IS SHOWN IN RED, INDIRECT HTML IS SUPPORTED</font>

entry.title: IF NO TEXT IS SHOWN BELOW, NESTED DIRECT HTML IS NOT ALLOWED

content.font: IF THIS TEXT IS SHOWN IN RED, DIRECT HTML NAMESPACE IS SUPPORTED
